name: ListAddons
description:
Retrieve all installed add-ons on your PagerDuty account.

Use this tool to list all the add-ons currently installed on your PagerDuty account. Add-ons provide additional functionality by integrating into PagerDuty's UI. This tool is useful for understanding what add-ons are available and active on your account. Requires `addons.read` OAuth scope.
